tdmtpy
Time Domain Moment Tensor Inversion in Python

tdmtpy is a python package developed for time domain inversion of complete seismic waveform data to obtain the seismic moment tensor. It supports deviatoric and full moment tensor inversions, and 1-D and 3-D basis Green’s functions.
